analyzed: ākāśagarbha nāma aṣṭottaraśata stotram
translated: The One Hundred and Eight Names of Ākāśagarbha, the Bodhisattva

analyzed: om namaḥ buddhāya
translated: Oṃ, homage to the Buddha

analyzed: ākāśagarbha sattva artha mahāsattva mahā dyute
translated: Ākāśagarbha, for the sake of beings, great being, of great splendor,

analyzed: mahā ratna su ratna agrya vajra ratna namaḥ astu te
translated: Great jewel, foremost of jewels, vajra jewel, homage to you!

analyzed: abhiṣeka mahā ratna mahā śuddha mahā śubha
translated: Consecration, great jewel, greatly pure, greatly auspicious,

analyzed: buddha ratna viśuddha aṅga ratna ratna namaḥ astu te
translated: Jewel of the Buddha, pure limbs, jewel of jewels, homage to you!

analyzed: ākāśa ākāśa saṃbhūta sarva ākāśa mahā nabha
translated: Arisen from space and space, all space, great sky,

analyzed: ākāśa dhātu sarva āśa sarva āśā agrya namaḥ astu te
translated: Space element, all wishes, foremost of all wishes, homage to you!

analyzed: ratna saṃbhava ratna ūrṇa buddha ūrṇa su tathāgata
translated: Jewel-born, jewel-stringed, Buddha-stringed, thus-gone,

analyzed: sarva ratna su sarva agrya ratna kārya namaḥ astu te
translated: All jewels, most excellent of all, jewel-maker, homage to you!

analyzed: ratna ratna agrya ratna ugra ratna sarva tathāgata
translated: Jewel of jewels, foremost of jewels, fierce jewel, all thus-gone,

analyzed: ratna uttama mahā ākāśa sama ākāśa namaḥ astu te
translated: Jewel supreme, great sky, equal to the sky, homage to you!

analyzed: alaṅkāra mahā śobha śobhā kara su śobhaka
translated: Ornament, great beauty, causing beauty, very beautiful,

analyzed: śuddha sarva artha śuddhārtha dāna carya namaḥ astu te
translated: Pure in all aims, pure in purpose, practice of generosity, homage to you!

analyzed: dharma ratna viśuddha agrya saṅgha ratna tathāgata
translated: Jewel of the Dharma, most pure, jewel of the Saṅgha, thus-gone,

analyzed: mahā abhiṣeka loka artha pramoda artha namaḥ astu te
translated: Great consecration, for the sake of the world, for the sake of delight, homage to you!

original: dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka /
analyzed: dāna pradāna dāna agrya tyāga tyāga agrya dāyaka
translated: Giver of gifts, foremost in giving, renunciator, foremost in renunciation, giver,

analyzed: sarva sattva artha tattva artha mahārtha artha namaḥ astu te
translated: Truth of the meaning of all beings, truth of the meaning of the great meaning, homage to you!

analyzed: cintārāja mahā teja dānapāramitā ānaya
translated: King of thoughts, of great splendor, method of the perfection of generosity,

analyzed: tathāgata mahāsattva sarva buddha namaḥ astu te
translated: Tathagatha, great being, all buddhas, homage to you!

analyzed: tathāgata mahā ratna tathāgata mahā prabha
translated: Tathagatha, great jewel, great light of the Tathagata,

analyzed: tathāgata mahāketo mahā hāsa namaḥ astu te
translated: Tathagatha, great banner, great laughter, homage to you!

analyzed: tathāgata abhiṣeka ājña mahā abhiṣeka mahā vibho
translated: Knowledge of the consecration of the Tathagatha, great consecration, great lord,

analyzed: lokanātha triloka agrya loka sūrya namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Lord of the world, foremost in the three worlds, sun of the world, homage to you!

analyzed: ratna adhika adhikatara ratna bhūṣaṇa
translated: More precious than precious, adorned with jewels, bearer of jewels,

analyzed: ratna āloka mahā loka ratna kīrte namaḥ astu te
translated: Light of jewels, great light, renowned as a jewel, homage to you!

analyzed: ratna utkara su ratna uttha maṇe vajra maṇe guṇa
translated: Heap of jewels, born of excellent jewels, jewel, diamond jewel, virtue,

analyzed: ratna ākara su dīpta aṅga sarva ratna namaḥ astu te
translated: Source of jewels, of well-illuminated limbs, all jewels, homage to you!
Great purpose, banner of the great, lord of jewels, fulfiller of all wishes,

analyzed: sarva abhiprāya saṃprāpti ratna rāśi namaḥ astu te
translated: Attainer of all intentions, heap of jewels, homage to you!

analyzed: abhvagrya vyāpi sarvātma vara prada mahā vara
translated: Foremost in the world, all-pervading, all-souled, giver of boons, great boon,

analyzed: vibhūte sarva saṃpatte vajra garbham namaḥ astu te
translated: To the one with all perfections, to Vajragarbha, homage to you!

analyzed: yaḥ kaścid dhārayet śivam
translated: Whoever may bear this auspicious eight-hundred name mantra,

analyzed: sarva buddha abhiṣekam tu sa prāpnoti anaghaḥ kṣaṇāt
translated: In that very moment, he becomes sinless and receives the consecration of all the Buddhas.

analyzed: śrī ākāśagarbha nāma aṣṭaśata adhyeṣaṇā stotram saṃpūrṇam
translated: The praise of the eight hundred names of the glorious Ākāśagarbha is complete.
